channel.title: lily on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in lily on Barefoot Rob

item.title: scc lesson with Lily
item.description: 16:58 Thursday 29 August 2019 JST Lily had not seen the (silent) video snippets for Marble Track 3, so I sent her a link on LINE after we finished looking at her study material. I told her about cases of normally countable words used as adjectives, (e.g. “He has a 3 year old.” vs “His kid is 3 years old.”)
